Description: Ostracon, large section (three fragments joined) of the upper-body of a buff-coloured pottery wine-jar, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text, now very faded.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393543) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393543)
